GSD.description:
xen/blkfront: force data bouncing when backend is untrusted

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.287 by commit 0b06590646e0857a804c9a08545791feb2278ab6. For more details please see the references link.
